divs: Sighting Detailsdriving to a store with a friend, i noticed a red light out the passenger window. we stopped and watched an object do the most amazing turns, stops and accelerations i have ever seen. there is no way on earth that the human race has ever made an object that can do what this thing did ! i was with one of my best friends who happens to be a pastor at a popular church and when i asked him what he thinks it was, he said, all i am supposed to believe is that it was a cheribem or a fallen angel of some sort. but i know and he does also what we really saw....it came from mexico sky`s toward us at a speed so fast if you closed your eyes for two seconds it would have been there. it stopped, went right, left, forward, back etc... then, i swear to you, it went back towards mexico, from oc. calif. in less than 5 seconds.
